title: (x) Halmark logo - custom drawn {Conor}
content:
Hi all,

Does anyone know the EXACT name for this font? (See sample)

I will be grateful for any information.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [storelocator.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20120217045458/http:/typophile.com/files/storelocator.gif) | 3.39 KB |
author: Johanna2

comments.content: The Hallmark is most likely custom, so sorry. No font there. Can't quite figure out what GOLD CROWN is. Similar to [Reminga](http://web.archive.org/web/20120217045458/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/reminga/).

Hi David and Koleslaw

The font is where Hallmark is written.

Thanks for your help.

The Hallmark logo was custom drawn by New York lettering artist and designer Andrew Szoeke in 1949. You can read about it [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20120217045458/http:/pressroom.hallmark.com/hmk_slogan_logo.html).

Hi Conor

I am grateful for your help, you are very nice.

:)
